statements: SELECT * FROM cybersecurity_reports;
SELECT report_name, report_date FROM cybersecurity_reports WHERE report_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT report_name, report_data->'summary' AS summary FROM cybersecurity_reports WHERE report_data @> '{"status": "completed"}';
SELECT * FROM cybersecurity_reports ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT report_name, report_date FROM cybersecurity_reports WHERE report_name LIKE 'Threat%';
SELECT * FROM cybersecurity_reports WHERE report_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT report_name, report_date FROM cybersecurity_reports WHERE report_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT report_name, report_data FROM cybersecurity_reports WHERE report_data->>'severity' = 'high' LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM cybersecurity_reports WHERE report_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' ORDER BY report_date ASC;
SELECT report_id, report_name, report_date FROM cybersecurity_reports WHERE report_data @> '{
SELECT * FROM regulatory_reports;
SELECT report_id, report_name, compliance_status FROM regulatory_reports WHERE compliance_status = TRUE;
SELECT report_name, regulatory_body FROM regulatory_reports WHERE regulatory_body = 'FDA';
SELECT * FROM audit_logs ORDER BY log_timestamp DESC;
SELECT log_id, user_id, action FROM audit_logs WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT report_name, report_date FROM regulatory_reports WHERE compliance_status = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM regulatory_reports WHERE report_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2022-01-01' ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT report_name, regulatory_body FROM regulatory_reports WHERE regulatory_body LIKE '%FDA%' ORDER BY report_name ASC;
SELECT report_name, compliance_status FROM regulatory_reports WHERE compliance_status = FALSE AND regulatory_body = 'EU Commission';
SELECT user_id, action, description FROM audit_logs WHERE action IN ('CREATE', 'UPDATE') ORDER BY log_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM compliance_reports;
SELECT report_id, report_date FROM compliance_reports ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT report_id, report_data FROM compliance_reports WHERE report_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT body_name, body_type FROM regulatory_bodies WHERE body_type LIKE '%government%';
SELECT * FROM audit_logs WHERE body_id = 1 ORDER BY log_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM compliance_reports ORDER BY report_id DESC;
SELECT report_date, report_data FROM compliance_reports WHERE report_id = 2;
SELECT body_name, body_type FROM regulatory_bodies WHERE body_type = 'Government';
SELECT log_timestamp, log_description FROM audit_logs WHERE body_id = 1 ORDER BY log_timestamp ASC;
SELECT report_id, report_date, report_data, body_name FROM compliance_reports JOIN regulatory_bodies ON compliance_reports.report_id = regulatory_bodies.body_id;
SELECT * FROM RegulatoryBodies;
SELECT body_name, region FROM RegulatoryBodies ORDER BY region ASC;
SELECT * FROM SQLDataReports WHERE report_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT r.body_name, r.region, d.report_name FROM RegulatoryBodies r JOIN SQLDataReports d ON r.body_id = d.body_id;
SELECT * FROM ComplianceVerification WHERE approved = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM RegulatoryBodies ORDER BY body_name DESC;

SELECT rb.body_name, rd.report_name, av.approved FROM RegulatoryBodies rb JOIN SQLDataReports rd ON rb.body_id = rd.body_id JOIN ComplianceVerification av ON rd.report_id = av.report_id WHERE av.approved = true;
SELECT ap.audit_id, ap.auditor_name, av.verification_date FROM AuditPurpose ap JOIN ComplianceVerification av ON ap.verification_id = av.verification_id WHERE av.verification_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT rb.body_name, COUNT(rd.report_id) AS total_reports FROM RegulatoryBodies rb LEFT JOIN SQLDataReports rd ON rb.body_id = rd.body_id GROUP BY rb.body_name;

SELECT rb.body_name, rd.report_name, cv.verification_date FROM RegulatoryBodies rb JOIN SQLDataReports rd ON rb.body_id = rd.body_id JOIN ComplianceVerification cv ON rd.report_id = cv.report_id ORDER BY cv.verification_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM regulatory_bodies;
SELECT name, contact_person, contact_email FROM regulatory_bodies WHERE id = 1;
SELECT domain_name, company_id, certification_status FROM cybersecurity_domain ORDER BY certification_status;
SELECT id, report_timestamp, report_type FROM sql_data_reports WHERE report_type = 'Financial';
SELECT audit_timestamp, auditor_name FROM audit_purposes WHERE report_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM regulatory_bodies ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT id, name, contact_person FROM regulatory_bodies WHERE contact_email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM compliance_verification WHERE verification_status = 'Verified' AND verification_timestamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY verification_timestamp DESC;
SELECT rp.id, rp.report_timestamp, rp.report_type, ap.auditor_name FROM sql_data_reports rp INNER JOIN audit_purposes ap ON rp.id = ap.report_id WHERE ap.auditor_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT cd.domain_name, cd.company_id, rb.name FROM cybersecurity_domain cd INNER JOIN regulatory_bodies rb ON cd.company_id = rb.id WHERE cd.certification_status = 'Valid';
